name: TV Head
description:
Play as a TV head with feet and get past every traps you'll encounter. Everything is deadly and also there will be a random mode to make it even chaotic! Game is inspired by Trap Adventure.

Controls:

WASD to MOVE

SPACE to JUMP

Mouse to Move Camera View

Made by:

Amir Ambojia - Game Designer / 3D Character Artist

Youngshil No - 3D Environment Artist / 2D Artist

Khaizter Topacio - Gameplay Programmer
